titleStmt.title: A brief answer to two papers procured from Friends in Maryland the one concerning Thomas Budds favouring John Lynam &c., the other concerning his owning George Keith's principles and doctrines.
titleStmt.author: Budd, Thomas, 1648-1699.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from colophon; place of publication and printer from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
